name: redis
description: MCP server to interact with Redis Server, AWS Memory DB, etc for caching or other use-cases where in-memory and key-value based storage is appropriate

prompts.name: Check Redis Connection Status
prompts.description: User requests the current Redis connection status.
prompts.text: What's the current Redis connection status?

prompts.name: Store Name in Redis
prompts.description: User wants to store their name in Redis.
prompts.text: Can you store my name "Alice" in Redis?

prompts.name: Verify Stored Name in Redis
prompts.description: User wants to verify the value stored in Redis.
